description:
block live migration fails if using libvirt python inter face migrationTOURI3 if source/dest have different instance dir.

migrationTOURI3 requires a xml on the dest host, but we don't update instance dir.

error logs:

  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/libvirt.py", line 1833, in migrateToURI3
    if ret == -1: raise libvirtError ('virDomainMigrateToURI3() failed', dom=self)
libvirtError: Unable to pre-create chardev file '/opt/stack/data/nova/instances/e73cc732-8b75-4743-8583-64da9bd7fee0/console.log': No such file or directory
title: block live-migration fails if source/dest have different instance dir

comments.content:
block live migration fails if using libvirt python inter face migrationTOURI3 if source/dest have different instance dir.


migrationTOURI3 requires a xml on the dest host, but we don't update instance dir.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~taget-9

comments.content:
In this case that source and dest host has difference instance_dir, we need to pass dest host's instancre_dir in the migration_data and update new_xml while using migrationTOURI3 method to do live migration.

This is what live migration data looks like now:

LibvirtLiveMigrateData(bdms=[],block_migration=False,disk_available_mb=71680,disk_over_commit=<?>,filename='tmpnFPPo2',graphics_listen_addr_spice=127.0.0.1,graphics_listen_addr_vnc=0.0.0.0,image_type='default',instance_relative_path='e73cc732-8b75-4743-8583-64da9bd7fee0',is_shared_block_storage=True,is_shared_instance_path=True,is_volume_backed=False,migration=Migration(29),serial_listen_addr='127.0.0.1',target_connect_addr=None)


we possible need to add a new filed dest_instance_dir which will be used while do update domain xml.


BTW, is there any require that all compute node's instance_dir should be same ?


Eli.
